events.message: The claimant reported a car accident where their vehicle collided with a tree on March 29th during a rainstorm.
After initial review, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to involvement of the customer’s vehicle in the collision.
An experienced agent was assigned to handle the case to ensure timely processing and customer support.
The claimant was contacted and notified that their claim has been officially received and is under review.
The claimant was asked to submit a police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and a repair estimate from a certified garage.
The claimant promptly provided all requested documents including the official police report and repair quotes within four days.
The investigation team began examining the circumstances of the collision, assessing fault and verifying damage extent.
The investigation report was finalized confirming the collision was caused by slippery road conditions with no third-party fault.
A fair settlement amount covering all repair costs was proposed to the claimant with detailed cost breakdown.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the promptness and transparency of the claim process and proposed settlement.
The claim was officially approved following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement and terms.
The settlement payment was issued directly to the claimant’s bank account in full and ahead of schedule.
The claim was formally closed after confirming the claimant received the funds and completed necessary vehicle repairs.
All claim documents and investigation reports were securely archived for future reference and regulatory compliance.
